import React from 'react'; import './GithubRepoCard.css'; import { Fade } from 'react-reveal'; export default function GithubRepoCard({ repo, isDark }) { function openRepoinNewTab(url) { const win = window.open(url, '_blank'); win.focus(); } return (
openRepoinNewTab(repo.node.url)} >

{repo.node.name}

{repo.node.description}

{repo.node.primaryLanguage !== null && (

{repo.node.primaryLanguage.name}

)}

{repo.node.forkCount}

{repo.node.stargazers.totalCount}

{repo.node.diskUsage} {' '} KB

); }
